descript.abstract: Includes plans that were identified historically as several types including Planned Building Groups (PBG), DP, MPBG, PD, etc.NOT included in these plans are General Development Plans (GDP), which are contained in a separate layer (PLAN_GENDEVPLAN_A) and Planned Unit Developments (PUD), which are identified within the Zoning layer (ZONE.ZONING_A).Since 2014 plan types are generically identified as Site Development Plans (SDP) which are defined as: Those plans representing projects that have gone through the Site Development Plan process (essentially zoning entitlements, ROW improvements, Stormwater/Wastewater infrastructure review, etc) and received an approval allowing the applicant to apply for building permits. The recordation provides 18 months of entitlement to their approved plan for the reviewing agencies. An approved SDP does NOT constitute building permit approval.Plans included may have a Status of "Recorded" (Recorded in the office of the Clerk and Recorder), which include a link to a digital copy of the plan, or "Under-Review" - which are not yet recorded (or may never be recorded) and do not include a link to the plan document.
descript.purpose: To identify locations of Site Developmet Plans (SDP) and associated information including the file name of PDF Documents containing all associated plan drawings. Originally created for use in conjunction with mapping the new zoning code in order to determine locations that would keep original zoning due to the Site Specific conditions typically associated with the plan. This layer also serves as a continued reference for zoning and permitting.
descript.supplinf: Includes all Site Development plans recorded by the Clerk and Recorder EXCEPT, Does not include PUD's, GDP's, LDF's or IMP's, which are in seperate layers.

idinfo.useconst: ACCESS CONSTRAINTS: This dataset restricted to City and County of Denver employees for official City business only. Contact the GIS Data Administrator for more information on distribution requirements/restrictions. USE CONSTRAINTS: The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use. ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided. NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES

secinfo.sechandl: Read access to all City users via the Intranet GIS Framework. Data available to those with access to SDE layers.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Several status from Accela groupd as: Under Review, Recorded
Log Number = left(13) from Application Name in Accela record - until Acela dev can fix/separate field data
Reception Number - assigned when plan document is approved and recorded with the Clerk and Recorder *Accela "Mylar Recordation Number"
Date recorded by Clerk and Recorder office Accela "Mylar recordation Date"
parcel size - primary parcel value only Ares is Sq. Ft.
Gross floor area Area is Sq. Ft.
proposed building height Text field to accomodate special char ' "
Notes for internal GIS use only
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
